resources.string: VirtualRadio by NINJ. Parsing channels, please wait..! Visit vradio.org for infos..

To start playback, long touch the station name. Touch star to add station to favorites.
Add new station at vradio.org/preadd.php.
Be careful, playing radio in mobile networks with high bitrates (>32kb) can be expensive if you don't have a flat rate.

Contains LGPL software Cling 1.0.5 http://4thline.org/projects/cling 

Special thanks to Robbie Müller, Peter Haight, Chris Pfranger, Markus Boeniger, Felix Schaad and Oli Wehrli
VirtualRadio 2.51 from NINJ GmbH Zurich\nVisit www.vradio.org
If you like VirtualRadio please support us to make it even better: Vote 5 Stars at the Play store or make a 1$/€ donation.
Record all radio sessions to SD card.
If the checkbox above is checked, the complete radio session is recorded to your SD card. Everything or nothing will be stored at the end of streaming if record is active or not.
Reload description file on startup or when this checkbox is changed to checked
Do you really want to delete this file:
Select the star of a station and it will show up as a favorite in this list\nClick this text to add a custom stream URL.
Enter deep linking URL of stream"
I Like (Contacting server to update database)
Contacting server to update database via http
Sorry, memory low, please free some space on your SD Card!
Your SD Card is low on memory or not mounted, please remove USB cable if present. VirtualRadio needs memory to cache data. You will need about 30 Megabytes for listening to 1 hour of a 64kb stream..
No connection to radio server, please try again later or check settings..
Start File Server to access the content of your SD card from a remote browser via WLAN. Be aware that everybody in the local network can access your content
Welcome to VirtualRadio.\n\nUse long click to select.
Quit and resume playback next restart

Welcome to VirtualRadio.

Use long click to select or play in this app!

Please select when to reload the description file(80kb)
Visible Speakers in WLAN (click to activate):
VirtualRadio will start at selected time and date with radio last played
WLAN must be enabled even if mobile data connection is used!
